courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Mastering Piano
courses.description: Advanced piano techniques and music theory for experienced players.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Learn how to produce, mix, and master music using Ableton Live.

courses.title: Singing Techniques for All Levels
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with professional techniques and exercises.

courses.title: DJing for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of DJing, including beatmatching, mixing, and song selection.

courses.title: Violin Mastery
courses.description: Advanced techniques and pieces for violinists looking to master their instrument.

courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.
